headline: Kick Out the Cold this Winter Season with 100 Energy Saving Actions from Consumers Energy
summary: Michigan's frigid winter weather is here and with colder temperatures comes an increase in energy consumption. Whatever your cozy is – inside by the fireplace, under a blanket, or with a hot cup of coffee, Consumers Energy is here to help keep you warm! While customers may see a seasonal increase in their bills this winter, Consumers Energy is prepared to assist customers in kicking out the cold by providing energy saving strategies and helpful resources for those who may need help paying for th
